info.desc: This is the door from the Transportation & Safety Building.
info.instr: Starting on the second floor of The Transportation and Safety Building, make your way to East-most point on the north side of the building.

info.desc: This is the end of the hall before the glass walkway.
info.instr: There will be a door on your left pictured above connected to a carpeted path (The Washington Ave Parking Ramp will be on your left).

info.desc: You will see this when facing the glass walkway.
info.instr: When it stops going straight, to the right is a glass walkway pictured.

info.desc: This is the last door before entering the Graduate Hotel.
info.instr: Straight ahead through will take you to the second floor of the Graduate Hotel.
